movie.name: Go
movie.synopsis: A supermarket clerk decides to step in for an absent drug dealer, setting off an explosive, comedic chain of events.
movie.starring: Sarah Polley, Timothy Olyphant, Katie Holmes

movie.name: Furious
movie.synopsis: Furious is an unexplored dimension populated by cackling sorcerers, whispering statues, fat adolescent warriors and lots and lots of live chickens. Furious is power. It’s magic. It’s a kaleidoscopic siege on the concept of storytelling. And Furious is “RED HOT KARATE ACTION! Filmed entirely on location in Southern California!”
movie.starring: Simon Rhee, Phillip Rhee, Howard Jackson
